multiple colors in the top portion of your slipper or make any sort of pattern on the top of your slipper change colors accordingly in this section chain 37 37 38 39 this will make for a roomy medium to wide slipper if you want it to be more fitted decrease the length of this chain row 1 double_crochet in third chain from hook double_crochet in each chain across chain 2 turn row 2-9 2-10 2-12 2-13
